Text: FW Resume you requestedwill try one more time jhh Original Message From Johnny H Hayes mailto Sent Tuesday April PM To Subject FW Resume you requested Rick I am attaching a bio on Glen He is Trent Lott and Thad Cochrans appointee and has done a great job at TVA TVA is now without a chairman It is my opinion that things will move much slower if President Bush does not appoint a chairman Mcculough is the right person He has told me that if the president wants to put another person as chairman after he or she is cleared through the process then he will step down This process will take six month or more I am told that there might have been an offer for acting Chairman but this would not be a good idea I would appreciate any help Please keep me informed Johnny Original Message From Hamill Carol L mailto Sent Tuesday April PM To Johnny H Hayes Subject Resume you requested GLM Bio doc Have a good day GLM Bio doc
